item.title: InnerSource Services Directory
item.description: Welcome to the InnerSource Services Directory. We have compiled a list of companies that provide InnerSource services that fit in 3 categories: Tools, Consulting Services and Training Services. If you would like to be added to the services list please send us an email at info@innersourcecommons.org.
